name: SuperiorTopDown
shortDescription: A superior top down movement engine

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: A snappier and more usefull version of top down controls
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SuperiorTopDownControls

eventsFunctions.description: run the action of pressing the down input for the object
eventsFunctions.name: SimulateDownPress

eventsFunctions.description: run the action of pressing the up input for the object
eventsFunctions.name: SimulateUpPress

eventsFunctions.description: run the action of pressing the left input for the object
eventsFunctions.name: SimulateLeftPress

eventsFunctions.description: run the action of pressing the right input for the object
eventsFunctions.name: SimulateRightPress

eventsFunctions.description: run the action of pressing the sprint input for the object
eventsFunctions.name: SimulateSprintPress

eventsFunctions.description: run the action of pressing the crouch input for the object
eventsFunctions.name: SimulateCrouchPress

eventsFunctions.description: run the action of pressing the dash input for the object
eventsFunctions.name: SimulateDashPress

propertyDescriptors.label: Max Speed
propertyDescriptors.description: The maximum speed the object can travel in pixels per second
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxSpeed

propertyDescriptors.label: Acceleration
propertyDescriptors.description: The acceleration of the object, set to -1 for instantaneous movement.
propertyDescriptors.name: Acceleration

propertyDescriptors.label: Deceleration
propertyDescriptors.description: The deceleration of the object, set to -1 for instantaneous stops.
propertyDescriptors.name: Deceleration

propertyDescriptors.label: Up
propertyDescriptors.description: The key to press to travel upwards
propertyDescriptors.name: Up

propertyDescriptors.label: Down
propertyDescriptors.description: The key to press to travel downwards
propertyDescriptors.name: Down

propertyDescriptors.label: Right
propertyDescriptors.description: The key to press to travel rightwards
propertyDescriptors.name: Right

propertyDescriptors.label: Left
propertyDescriptors.description: The key to press to travel leftwards
propertyDescriptors.name: Left

propertyDescriptors.label: Dash
propertyDescriptors.description: The key to press to dash
propertyDescriptors.name: Dash

propertyDescriptors.label: Sprint
propertyDescriptors.description: The key to press to sprint
propertyDescriptors.name: Sprint

propertyDescriptors.label: Rotate with movement
propertyDescriptors.description: If true the sprite will rotate to face the direction it is traveling
propertyDescriptors.name: Rotate

propertyDescriptors.label: Rotation
propertyDescriptors.description: The oreintation of the object
propertyDescriptors.name: Rotation

propertyDescriptors.label: X Velocity
propertyDescriptors.description: the velocity of the object in the x direction
propertyDescriptors.name: Xvel

propertyDescriptors.label: Y Velocity
propertyDescriptors.description: the velocity of the object in the y direction
propertyDescriptors.name: Yvel

propertyDescriptors.label: Dash duration
propertyDescriptors.description: The duration in seconds the dash should take
propertyDescriptors.name: DashDur

propertyDescriptors.label: Dash distance
propertyDescriptors.description: The distance the dash should cover
propertyDescriptors.name: DashDist

propertyDescriptors.label: Dash cooldown
propertyDescriptors.description: The cooldown between dashes
propertyDescriptors.name: DashCooldown

propertyDescriptors.label: Dash direction
propertyDescriptors.description: The direction of the dash
propertyDescriptors.name: DashDir

propertyDescriptors.label: Use curent angle
propertyDescriptors.description: if true when dashing the object will dash in the direction they are currently facing/moving. If false the object will dash relative to the inputs being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: DashAngleToggle

propertyDescriptors.label: current Y acceleration
propertyDescriptors.description: the Y acceleration for this frame
propertyDescriptors.name: YAccel

propertyDescriptors.label: current X acceleration
propertyDescriptors.description: the X acceleration for this frame
propertyDescriptors.name: XAccel

propertyDescriptors.label: Dashing
propertyDescriptors.description: wheather of nor the object is dashing
propertyDescriptors.name: Dashing

propertyDescriptors.label: Dash origin y
propertyDescriptors.description: the y position where the dash was initiated
propertyDescriptors.name: DashOriginY

propertyDescriptors.label: Dash origin x
propertyDescriptors.description: the x position where the dash was initiated
propertyDescriptors.name: DashOriginX

propertyDescriptors.label: Right button pressed
propertyDescriptors.description: wheather or not the right button is currently being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: RightPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Down button pressed
propertyDescriptors.description: wheather or not the down button is currently being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: DownPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Left button pressed
propertyDescriptors.description: wheather or not the left button is currently being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: LeftPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Up button pressed
propertyDescriptors.description: wheather or not the up button is currently being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: UpPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Sprint button pressed
propertyDescriptors.description: wheather or not the Sprint button is currently being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: SprintPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Crouch button pressed
propertyDescriptors.description: wheather or not the Crouch button is currently being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: CrouchPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Crouch
propertyDescriptors.description: The button to press to crouch
propertyDescriptors.name: Crouch

propertyDescriptors.label: Sprint multiplyer
propertyDescriptors.description: The number to muptiply your max speed by to sprint
propertyDescriptors.name: SprintMoveMultiplyer

propertyDescriptors.label: Crouch multiplyer
propertyDescriptors.description: The number to muptiply your max speed by to crouch
propertyDescriptors.name: CrouchMoveMultiplyer

propertyDescriptors.label: Current max speed
propertyDescriptors.description: the current max speed adjusted for sprint and crouch
propertyDescriptors.name: CurMaxSpeed
